text: The Miracle Worker () is a 1936 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Medvedkin."Полка. Освобожденное кино". Забытые фильмы на "Винзаводе"Чудесница (1936) It stars Leonid Alekseev, Tatyana Barysheva, and Zinaida Bokareva. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1936 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Medvedkin Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Miracle Worker (1936 movie)
